name: 林水泉
objective:
A. 介紹熱傳基本公式，包含熱傳導、熱對流、熱輻射、潛熱變化、熱交換器以及沸騰與凝結。
B. 將課堂上所教授之內容，依章節給予相關作業，培養學生閱讀及思考的能力。
1. Introduction
2. Steady-State Conduction one Dimension
3. Steady-State Conduction Multiple Dimensions
4. Unsteady-state Conduction
5. Principle of Convection
6. Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection Heat Transfer
7. Natural Convection Systems
8. Radiation Heat Transfer
9. Condensation and Boiling
10. Heat Exchanges
schedule:
週次	講授內容概要	課本章節
1~2	Introduction	Chapter 1
3~4	Steady-State Conduction one Dimension	Chapter 2
5~6	Steady-State Conduction Multiple Dimensions	Chapter 3
7~8	Unsteady-state Conduction	Chapter 4
9	期中考
10~11	Principle of Convection	Chapter 5

12~13    ｉEmpirical and Practical Relations for Forced-              cnvection      Heat Transfer	Chapter 6
14~15	Natural Convection Systems	Chapter 7
16	Radiation Heat Transfer	Chapter 8
17	Condensation and Boiling ＆ Heat Exchanges	Chapter 9、10
18	期末考
scorePolicy: 作業與平時出席佔30％，期中考佔30％，期末考佔40％
materials:
教科書及參考書目
“Heat Transfer,” 9th Ed, J.P.Holman
